TopicTitle: the KSSC (Kerbal Supersonic Car) on YouTube

Articles.Content:
I've just made this video over the last 24 hours (yeah, yeah) and slapped it on YouTube for the whole world to see!

I draw obvious (and I mean obvious) inspiration from Danny2462, because I find his style so humorous. If you could spare a moment and watch it, maybe offer a little criticism, I'd be your bestest friend!

I plan on doing more than this in the future and need all the help I can get. I'm not trying to rip off Danny, I'm testing the waters with his style first! Eventually I'll do a more narrated (and hopefully planned) video once I can get full Fraps, as I am poor.

Thanks for watching if you took the time!
And you're my new bestest friend. Thanks a bunch!

Wow... awesome and a bit scary, been working on something similar for my own video series. We'll have to compare notes soon.

*evil grin*

Ok, research concluded!

I have a nice little craft here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/lbm7/

It can do some pretty stable cruising through hilly terrain, around 80 m/s.

Also got the video up, its in my sig below.
